text:
@realDonaldTrump The Dow rising hasn't put the tens of millions of people out of work thanks to your mishandling of the coronavirus pandemic back to work. Call me when everyone gets their jobs back, Liar-in-Chief.

P.S. I hope you're still fuming over Mattis righteously excoriating you earlier.
